price: Sila isaan Rabbiin ala gabbaramtoota taasifatuu? “Ragaa keessan fidadhaa” jedhiin, Kun gorsa namoota ana waliin jiraniifi gorsa namoota ana dura turaniiti, Garuu irra hedduun isaanii dhugaa hin beekanu, Kanaafuu (isa) irraa garagalu.
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةٗۖ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡۖ هَٰذَا ذِكۡرُ مَن مَّعِيَ وَذِكۡرُ مَن قَبۡلِيۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ فَهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi ālihatan qul hātū bur'hānakum hādhā dhik'ru man maʿiya wadhik'ru man qablī bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna al-ḥaqa fahum muʿ'riḍūna
